file_content.text: Rescue? At last. Friendly face and weapons. After so many rakghouls, most welcome.
Rescuers? Friendly faces--well armed, too. Yes, such a relief after so many rakghouls.
I took care of the rakghouls.
Much thanks. Annoyance it was necessary.
Doctor Zalaren, lead of Project Quell. Apology for such inconvenience. So unacceptable. Future, rakghouls will all have shock collars.
I've had enough of this place.
Yes, quite. Panic room's making us panic--a little counterintuitive. You have Doctor Zalaren's thanks.
Security systems active--excellent, most excellent. We go safely. Much is owed for this.
Knew it. Security safeguards, all inadequate.
